Name: Grotesque Beauty - A Horror Visual Novel
About the game: Anita has been experiencing bad dreams each night; it hasn't helped that her parents are often working through the night, leaving her home alone. Her friend, Rachel, agrees to come over to keep her company and allay her dark premonition. However, their night gets a whole lot more bizarre, when Rachel discovers a haunting painting that adorns her friend's living room. Grotesque Beauty is a horror narrative game featuring branching paths and 30 gruesome endings. The game focuses on building an eerie atmosphere and haunting visuals rather than relying on jumpscares. The story takes inspiration from the works of acclaimed horror creator Junji Ito and puts the players in the driving seat. A story that sets the scene gradually, letting the mysteries and sense of dread build before the nightmare truly begins. Creepy atmosphere that will make your skin crawl. Animated characters. Over 100 unique illustrated artwork. Ambient soundtrack. Branching paths that reward repeat playthroughs. 30 Different endings. A demo of Grotesque Beauty is available to play. Download via the button at the top.
